history.text: So many big name actors/actresses in the Avengers.
Yes there are.  I especially like Robert Downey Jr.
I like him too.  I had forgotten Chris Evans was in this also.
Do you like action movies, like The Avengers?
Sort of.  It really depends who is in it.  I have seen a few.  This ones says it is the 6th in the series.  I have certainly not seen them all.
I really enjoyed when the superheros try to stop Loki from subjugating Earth.
The critical responses seem a little over the top.
I think the Rotten Tomatoes score of 92% is accurate with how I felt about the movie.
I see the Rotten Tomatoes score is rather high.  Do you usually check that before seeing a movie?
I do.  I generally only watch films with at least a 50% Rotten Tomatoes score.
SHIELD seems to recruit only the best.
I had forgotten that Disney was involved with the Avengers.
Yes.  I didn't really care for the scene when Loki reaches earth using the Tesseract.  It seemed over the top.
The wormhole conveniently opened for Loki to reach Earth.
Yes, and of course it was when Nick Fury happened to be near by.
Avengers is predictable but the characters are fun and it has a great cast.
I don't know that I would call that scene a key scene but then again if Loki never reached Earth, the movie couldn't have happened.
I liked Mark Ruffalo as Bruce Banner.
It was interesting that the group was divided on how to approach Loki.
That is interesting and also fun when Thor attempts to stop the Hulk
It was unfortunate that the physicist from the research facility was captured and controlled by Loki.
That was unfortunate.  It all comes back to the wormhole.  Now it is used above Stark Tower to start his invasion.
Yes. The wormhole allowed the Chitauri fleet to invade Earth.  That was a frightening scene, but the acting was stellar.
Once they were motivated to work as a team, Loki didn't have a chance.
I like that they worked together to save civilians.
Yes, and it is a good thing they were able to help evacute the citizens too.
Certainly the nuclear missile was a bad idea.
I really felt happy when Thor returned Loki and the Tesseract to Asgard.
It was amazing that the Hulk could save Iron Man as he fell back to Earth
It was scary when Iron Man's suit ran out of power.
They really worked as a team and the movie left it open for many new adventures to follow.

uid1response.feedback: The other user was submitting some responses back to back.  I wasn't sure if that was okay.
